verses.kjv: And Moses gathered all the congregation of the children of Israel together, and said unto them, These are the words which the LORD hath commanded, that ye should do them.
verses.ct: Moses assembled the entire community of Israel and told them, "These are the instructions the LORD has commanded you to follow."

verses.kjv: Six days shall work be done, but on the seventh day there shall be to you an holy day, a sabbath of rest to the LORD: whosoever doeth work therein shall be put to death.
verses.ct: "You may work for 6 days, but the 7th day must be set apart as holy for you — a Sabbath of complete rest dedicated to the LORD. Anyone who does any work on that day must be put to death."

verses.kjv: Ye shall kindle no fire throughout your habitations upon the sabbath day.
verses.ct: "You must not light a fire anywhere in your homes on the Sabbath day."

verses.kjv: And Moses spake unto all the congregation of the children of Israel, saying, This is the thing which the LORD commanded, saying,
verses.ct: Moses spoke to the whole community of Israel and said, "Here is what the LORD has commanded:"

verses.kjv: Take ye from among you an offering unto the LORD: whosoever is of a willing heart, let him bring it, an offering of the LORD; gold, and silver, and brass,
verses.ct: "Collect a contribution from among yourselves for the LORD. Everyone whose heart is willing should bring an offering to the LORD: gold, silver, and bronze,"

verses.kjv: And blue, and purple, and scarlet, and fine linen, and goats’ hair,
verses.ct: "blue, purple, and scarlet yarn, fine linen, and goat hair,"

verses.kjv: And rams’ skins dyed red, and badgers’ skins, and shittim wood,
verses.ct: "ram skins dyed red, fine leather, and acacia wood,"

verses.kjv: And oil for the light, and spices for anointing oil, and for the sweet incense,
verses.ct: "olive oil for the lamps, spices for the anointing oil and for the fragrant incense,"

verses.kjv: And onyx stones, and stones to be set for the ephod, and for the breastplate.
verses.ct: "onyx stones and other gemstones to be mounted on the ephod and the breastplate."

verses.kjv: And every wise hearted among you shall come, and make all that the LORD hath commanded;
verses.ct: "Every skilled craftsman among you should come and construct everything the LORD has commanded:"

verses.kjv: The tabernacle, his tent, and his covering, his taches, and his boards, his bars, his pillars, and his sockets,
verses.ct: "the tabernacle with its tent and covering, its clasps, frames, crossbars, posts, and bases,"

verses.kjv: The ark, and the staves thereof, with the mercy seat, and the vail of the covering,
verses.ct: "the ark with its carrying poles, the mercy seat, and the curtain that screens it,"

verses.kjv: The table, and his staves, and all his vessels, and the shewbread,
verses.ct: "the table with its carrying poles and all its utensils, and the bread of the Presence,"

verses.kjv: The candlestick also for the light, and his furniture, and his lamps, with the oil for the light,
verses.ct: "the lampstand for light along with its accessories and lamps, and the oil for the light,"

verses.kjv: And the incense altar, and his staves, and the anointing oil, and the sweet incense, and the hanging for the door at the entering in of the tabernacle,
verses.ct: "the incense altar with its carrying poles, the anointing oil, the fragrant incense, and the screen for the entrance of the tabernacle,"

verses.kjv: The altar of burnt offering, with his brasen grate, his staves, and all his vessels, the laver and his foot,
verses.ct: "the altar for burnt offerings with its bronze grating, its carrying poles, and all its utensils, the basin and its stand,"

verses.kjv: The hangings of the court, his pillars, and their sockets, and the hanging for the door of the court,
verses.ct: "the curtains for the courtyard with their posts and bases, and the screen for the courtyard entrance,"

verses.kjv: The pins of the tabernacle, and the pins of the court, and their cords,
verses.ct: "the tent pegs for the tabernacle and the courtyard, along with their ropes,"

verses.kjv: The cloths of service, to do service in the holy place, the holy garments for Aaron the priest, and the garments of his sons, to minister in the priest’s office.
verses.ct: "the woven garments for service in the holy place, the sacred clothing for Aaron the priest, and the clothing for his sons to serve as priests."

verses.kjv: And all the congregation of the children of Israel departed from the presence of Moses.
verses.ct: Then the entire community of Israel left Moses' presence.

verses.kjv: And they came, every one whose heart stirred him up, and every one whom his spirit made willing, and they brought the LORD’s offering to the work of the tabernacle of the congregation, and for all his service, and for the holy garments.
verses.ct: Everyone whose heart was moved and whose spirit was willing came and brought their contributions to the LORD for the construction of the meeting tent, for all its furnishings, and for the sacred clothing.

verses.kjv: And they came, both men and women, as many as were willing hearted, and brought bracelets, and earrings, and rings, and tablets, all jewels of gold: and every man that offered offered an offering of gold unto the LORD.
verses.ct: Men and women alike — all who were willing — came bringing brooches, earrings, rings, and ornaments, every kind of gold jewelry. Each person who presented a gold offering dedicated it to the LORD.

verses.kjv: And every man, with whom was found blue, and purple, and scarlet, and fine linen, and goats’ hair, and red skins of rams, and badgers’ skins, brought them.
verses.ct: Everyone who had blue, purple, or scarlet yarn, fine linen, goat hair, ram skins dyed red, or fine leather brought what they had.

verses.kjv: Every one that did offer an offering of silver and brass brought the LORD’s offering: and every man, with whom was found shittim wood for any work of the service, brought it.
verses.ct: Everyone who could contribute silver or bronze brought their offering to the LORD, and anyone who had acacia wood useful for any part of the project brought it.

verses.kjv: And all the women that were wise hearted did spin with their hands, and brought that which they had spun, both of blue, and of purple, and of scarlet, and of fine linen.
verses.ct: Every woman skilled with her hands spun thread and brought what she had made — blue, purple, and scarlet yarn, and fine linen.

verses.kjv: And all the women whose heart stirred them up in wisdom spun goats’ hair.
verses.ct: All the women whose hearts moved them to use their skill spun thread from goat hair.

verses.kjv: And the rulers brought onyx stones, and stones to be set, for the ephod, and for the breastplate;
verses.ct: The leaders brought onyx stones and other gemstones for mounting on the ephod and the breastplate,

verses.kjv: And spice, and oil for the light, and for the anointing oil, and for the sweet incense.
verses.ct: as well as spices and olive oil for the lamps, the anointing oil, and the fragrant incense.

verses.kjv: The children of Israel brought a willing offering unto the LORD, every man and woman, whose heart made them willing to bring for all manner of work, which the LORD had commanded to be made by the hand of Moses.
verses.ct: Every man and woman among the Israelites whose heart motivated them to give freely brought their voluntary offerings to the LORD for all the work that the LORD had commanded through Moses.

verses.kjv: And Moses said unto the children of Israel, See, the LORD hath called by name Bezaleel the son of Uri, the son of Hur, of the tribe of Judah;
verses.ct: Then Moses told the Israelites, "Pay attention — the LORD has specifically chosen Bezalel son of Uri, grandson of Hur, from the tribe of Judah."

verses.kjv: And he hath filled him with the spirit of God, in wisdom, in understanding, and in knowledge, and in all manner of workmanship;
verses.ct: "God has filled him with the spirit of God, giving him wisdom, understanding, knowledge, and skill in every kind of craft."

verses.kjv: And to devise curious works, to work in gold, and in silver, and in brass,
verses.ct: "He can design artistic works and execute them in gold, silver, and bronze,"

verses.kjv: And in the cutting of stones, to set them, and in carving of wood, to make any manner of cunning work.
verses.ct: "cut and set gemstones, carve wood, and produce every type of expert craftsmanship."

verses.kjv: And he hath put in his heart that he may teach, both he, and Aholiab, the son of Ahisamach, of the tribe of Dan.
verses.ct: "God has also given him the ability to teach others — both him and Oholiab son of Ahisamach, from the tribe of Dan."

verses.kjv: Them hath he filled with wisdom of heart, to work all manner of work, of the engraver, and of the cunning workman, and of the embroiderer, in blue, and in purple, in scarlet, and in fine linen, and of the weaver, even of them that do any work, and of those that devise cunning work.
verses.ct: "God has filled them both with exceptional skill to do every kind of work — engraving, designing, embroidering with blue, purple, and scarlet yarn and fine linen, weaving, and creating artistic designs of every kind."
